message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 55/45.  This way, we both get a decent share.
I think we can both do better than a 55/45 split. I'm proposing we go for 60/40, giving you a bit more to make up for the inflation you'll be facing in the next round.
Okay, let's try a more balanced approach.  I propose we split the money equally at 50/50. We both face inflation, and this way we can maximize our gains before it gets worse.
